Conway.Dennis F. Cantrell Field:
Dennis F. Cantrell Field (ICAO: KCWS, FAA LID: CWS, formerly M03) was a public use airport located one nautical mile (2 km) southeast of the central business district of Conway, in Faulkner County, Arkansas, United States. It was owned by the City of Conway.
It is replaced with the new Conway Airport at Cantrell Field since September 2014.
